Articles.Content:
Ok, not sure if this is already in-game or already discussed, I did a search but found nothing...

I was wondering, would it be at all possible to add support for joysticks for using spaceplanes.  I think it would help make flying them so much easier and far more intuitive than WASD keyboard controls

I am using a saitek x55 flight system.. I can confirm that joystick / rudder /split dual trust joystick work, and is able to be used fyling your airplane/spaceplanes..

You need to configure the ingame settings and assign the correct axis, but this is pretty easy.  As default no joystick is configured to work, so go into settings and configure the joystick and it should work pretty easy.

Edited May 11, 2016 by Peder
